item.title: 随着积压项目的增加，COOEC 计划完成 73 个海上项目
item.description: 尽管上半年收入下降了 15.7%，但通过严格控制成本和提高运营效率，COOEC 实现了 14.4% 的弹性利润增长【原文：Despite a 15.7% decline in first-half revenue, COOEC achieved a resilient 14.4% increase in profit through stringent cost control and enhanced operational efficiency】

item.title: 乌克兰袭击导致俄罗斯停止向匈牙利出口石油
item.description: 火箭弹和无人机袭击了位于俄罗斯的德鲁日巴（Druzhba）石油管道设施，该管道可将原油输送到匈牙利、德国和俄罗斯的一个海港【原文：Rockets and drones hit a Druzhba oil pipeline facility located in Russia that enables the flow of crude to Hungary, Germany and a Russian maritime port】

item.title: 欧盟面临日益依赖进口液化天然气的新挑战
item.description: 欧盟最新的天然气路线图旨在将俄罗斯能源从该集团的能源组合中根除。但这样做会使该地区面临其他潜在的干扰源【原文：The European Union's latest gas roadmap is aiming to eradicate Russian energy from the bloc's energy mix. But in doing so it opens the region up to other potential sources of disruption】
